text: Harry Roe Hughes (November 13, 1926 â€“ March 13, 2019) was an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Hughes was the 57th Governor of Maryland from 1979 to 1987. Hughes died at his home in Denton, Maryland from pneumonia-related problems on March 13, 2019 at the age of 92.Ex-Maryland Gov. Harry R. Hughes dies at 92; served 2 terms ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Governors of Maryland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Harry Hughes
